title: JBL Tune 760NC
description: ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION: Tune out the Noise & Tune in to your Music with JBL Tune 760NC wireless headset.

JBL PURE BASS SOUND: For over 70 years, JBL has engineered the precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. These Bluetooth headphones reproduce that same JBL sound, punching out bass that’s both deep and powerful.

UP TO 50 HOURS PLAYTIME: Listen wirelessly for up to 35 hours with Active Noise Cancellation or up to 50 hours without Noise Cancellation for long-lasting fun. Recharge the battery quickly in 2 hours or enjoy endlessly in wired mode using the detachable AUX cable provided.

GOOGLE FAST PAIR: Thanks to Fast Pair enabled by Google, the JBL Tune 760NC are immediately connected to your Android device. You can also pair multiple devices just by tapping on the devices’ screen.

title: Wave Call
tagline: Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch with 1.69" (4.29 cm) HD Curved Display, 150+ Watch Faces, Heart Rate & SPO2 Monitoring
description: Stay connected always. Keep in touch with your near and dear ones with Bluetooth calling on the go and a responsive dialpad that allows you to save and call 10 contacts right from your smartwatch!

Never miss a step with boAt Wave Call. Relax and unwind with Guided Breathing and Ultimate Mindfulness. With an elegant metal body and feather-light weight, wear it all day and track your health with real-time heart rate tracking, accurate SpO2 monitoring and more!
Stay active with boAt Wave Call as it sends you smart sedentary alerts and keeps notifying you to move. It also pushes you towards a healthier lifestyle by sending alerts to stay hydrated.
